titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Jane Howard Guernsey Papers, approximately 1970-1999
titlestmt.author: Inventory prepared by the Archives and Special Collections Library, Vassar College Libraries

publicationstmt.publisher: Archives and Special Collections Library, Vassar College Libraries

profiledesc.creation: Finding aid encoded by Laura Streett December 2006

did.head: Collection Summary

repository.label: Repository:
repository.corpname: Archives and Special Collections Library, Vassar College Libraries

did.abstract: Translations and photocopies of three 17th century sources regarding Elena Lucrezia Cornaro Piscopia by Massimiliano Deza, Antonion Lupis and Benedetto Baccini.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Jane Howard Guernsey, Vassar Class of 1949, published a biography of the first woman to receive the Ph.D., THE LADY CORNARO: PRIDE AND PRODIGY OF VENICE, in 1999 after nearly three decades of research.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: Translations and photocopies of three 17th century sources regarding Elena Lucrezia Cornaro Piscopia by Massimiliano Deza, Antonion Lupis and Benedetto Baccini.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: This collection is open for research according to the regulations of the Vassar College Archives and Special Collections Library without any additional restrictions.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use
userestrict.p: Permission to quote (publish) from unpublished or previously published material must be obtained as described in the regulations of the Vassar College Archives and Special Collections Library.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Materials
relatedmaterial.p: Guernsey, Jane Howard. The Lady Cornaro: Pride and Prodigy of Venice. Clinton Corners, N.Y. : College Avenue Press, 1999.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Gift of Jane Howard Guernsey, November 2006.

phystech.head: Physical Characteristics and Technical Requirements
phystech.p: Audiotapes require use of tape machine - no transcripts available.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Jane Howard Guernsey Papers, Archives and Special Collections Library, Vassar College Libraries.

dsc.head: Container List
dsc.p: There is no container list currently available for this collection.
